title: FRIDAY - TNF recap/injury updates 2020
itunes:title: FRIDAY - TNF recap/injury updates 2020
description:
Thursday Night Football featured a big-time NFC West matchup (0:08) as the Seahawks prevailed. We'll hear from Kyler Murray (1:23) for the latest on his injured shoulder. Speaking of injuries, we have the latest on Saints running back Alvin Kamara and Drew Brees (2:00) as well as Teddy Bridgewater's (2:51) status for Sunday's game against the Lions. Speaking of the Lions, rookie running back D'Andre Swift dealing with an injury of his own (3:16) putting his status in jeopardy for Sunday. Plus, one of the NFL's top rookie performers joins GMFB (3:36) for an interview

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
